Why do I still play this game. Every time I launch this game I remember how much I hate it and vow to never play again. Yet I find myself consistently playing despite all of my experiences being negative. I hate this game so much but for some reason I keep playing it. Please don't do this to yourself. Save yourself the pain and DO NOT get this game.

Great game. Best fps out there by far. Valorant, all cods, all battle royale games, pure trash compared to this game.
None of them have the same issue cs:go has though. 
The sheer amount of cheaters. Nearly every game you have people looking at you through walls 180 headshotting you when you sneak behind them and they couldn't have heard you.
You win a few rounds early, great. that's all you are getting because they will rage toggle and you will not win a single round again until they have 15 rounds.
How easy it is to cheat in cs:go, it's beyond sad.

You shouldnt download this game. There are a lot of cheater in it and a developer team doesnt really do anything with it. If you are new in this game, then try another game because 80% of the new accounts are using cheat. Even if you good in it and the enemy thinks you are using cheat, the will turn their cheat on and you wont have any chance. (personally experience) The company want to make money from this game, what is not a problem but they dont care about the players and the cheaters. If they really want to stop the cheaters they would give motherboard IP ban or VGA card ban. They just dont want to lose the players who are playing day to day.
